gobblin.data.management.copy.replication

Class ConfigBasedDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.copy.replication.ConfigBasedDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CopyableDataset, CopyableDatasetBase, Dataset

    public class ConfigBasedDataset
extends Object
implements CopyableDataset
    Extends CopyableDataset to represent data replication dataset based on Config Detail logics
    • Picked the preferred topology
    • Based on current running cluster and CopyMode (push or pull) pick the routes
    • Based on optimization policy to pick the CopyFrom and CopyTo pair
    • Generated the CopyEntity based on CopyFrom and CopyTo pair

      • getCopyableFiles

        public Collection<? extends CopyEntity> getCopyableFiles(FileSystem targetFs,
                                                         CopyConfiguration copyConfiguration)
                                                  throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: CopyableDataset
        Find all CopyEntitys in this dataset.

        This method should return a collection of CopyEntity, each describing one work unit for distcp. The most common CopyEntity is the CopyableDataset, describing a file that should be copied to the target. See CopyableFile for explanation of the information contained in the CopyableFiles.

        Specified by:
        getCopyableFiles in interface CopyableDataset
        Parameters:
        targetFs - target FileSystem where copied files will be placed.
        copyConfiguration - CopyConfiguration for this job. See CopyConfiguration.
        Returns:
        List of CopyEntitys in this dataset.
        Throws:
        IOException
